## 1  What’s Going On?

> We couldn’t afford to rent a Terminator, so we did the next best thing:  
> **imported wisdom from your own future.**  
> Second‑ and third‑year Psychology students will beam back lessons, hacks and tales of derring-do to help you ace the journey ahead.

**Your mission, first‑years**

1. Grill the “time‑travellers” for intel.  
2. Capture any burning questions in the live WooClap.  
3. Leave with at least one actionable plan for world (or degree) domination.

---

**What to drop in the Woo**

* A question you don’t feel comfy asking aloud  
* A topic you want a deeper dive on during the Panel or afterwards  
* Any comments

> **Note:** The form is anonymous. We’ll surface the most‑upvoted questions live. And any we don't cover will be sent to the time‑travellers for a follow‑up (after exams!)
